article_title: The Surprising Failure Of Food Labeling

article_metadata.description: Food labeling is one of the least objectionable types of regulation bursting into the scene in recent decades. It is also one of the least successful. The ongoing explosive debate about labeling foods produced from genetically engineered crops, known as GMOs, is a testament to how important food labeling is perceived. [...]
article_metadata.author: Omri Ben-Shahar
